title: Layered Necklace
description: Our Layered Necklace elegantly compliments your new dress you've been dying to show off!

title: Opal Stone Moon Choker Necklace
description: Dress up your neck with our Opal Stone Moon Choker Necklace, available in numerous colors. The necklace is perfect for casual outings and is sure to have your friends asking where you bought it from.

title: Heart Pendant Multilayer Choker
description: This Heart Pendant Multilayer Choker is a clean accessory to add to your outfit.

title: Slim Bar Necklace
description: The Slim Bar Necklace shines with casual wear. It's simple design makes it an easy addition to any outfit!

title: Gemstone Necklace
description: Perfect for formal and semi-formal events, this necklace stands out while simultaneously complimenting your outfit. Available in pink, teal, black, and beige.

title: Howlite Double-V Necklace
description: Howlite is known to reduce anxiety, tension and stress. If you have a lot of work to do, and want to look good doing it, then our Howlite V Necklace is perfect for you!

title: Multilayered Rhinestone Choker
description: Our fashionable Rhinestone Choker is a popular item, this comes as no surprise. The rhinestone pendant accents the choker very nicely, setting it apart from other chokers on the market.

title: Cascading Choker Necklace
description: Two words come to mind while looking at this necklace. Class. Simplicity.

title: Crystal Watermelon Necklace
description: Our trendy 'Watermelon' necklace is a stunning piece for the summer. This necklace won't be available for much longer so grab it while you can!

title: Blue Evil Eye Necklace
description: Don't miss your chance to buy our Evil Eye Necklace! Available for a limited time.
